reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, well-made, and comfortable, with a flattering fit around the tummy area. The dress is super stretchy, and one customer notes it drapes nicely on the body. However, the fabric quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising it while others find it poor. Moreover, several customers report issues with the dress rolling up, particularly noting that the off-the-shoulder element does

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it. Now. Don’t hesitate just do it.
items.body: The most STUNNING dress I’ve ever owned. I’m actually obsessed and will keep this until it doesn’t fit and then I’ll buy another one IMMEDIATELY. It’s so soft and comfortable I wore it all night. It didn’t show my shapewear and it hugs everything in all of the right places. The quality is genuinely phenomenal and it’s not too thin of a material so it’s not see through or too cold either. Read more
items.author: Victoria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chic and Comfortable
items.body: Really nice quality! If you like to show off your curves this is a really great fit. Stretchy and comfortable. Could easily wear for hours at a time. Color and fabric make it easy to disguise any shapewear you may want to wear underneath. Read more
items.author: Haley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress. Annoying shoulder material
items.body: The dress is very flattering and has a good amount of stretch. It’s double layered for the body, sheer for the sleeves. The flared sleeves are super cute and I love the sparkles on the black dress; they are multi-color iridescent and they don’t fall off. The only flaw I see with this dress was that the off-the-shoulder material kept rising up, even with little movement and I had to keep adjusting it down over my shoulder. I would try to get it sewn down for the next time I want to wear this dress. No regrets on the purchase. For reference, I am about 160lbs and 5’4”. I got a large. I wanted a little room for eating. It was great to wear a dress that wasn’t super tight but still draped my body nicely. Read more
items.author: Katherine T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Piece of Clothing I've Gotten
items.body: Fit: I got a medium which I normally get and it fits great. See through: I went to my Senior prom in this dress and I didn't see anything under that would lead me to believe it was. Material quality: It's soft and feels nice. Value for money: If you want a good date dress or other evening event this is a great cheaper alternative especially with how exquisite it looks. I have had 0 problem with the dress just make sure to follow the washing instructions because i didn't and that is 100 Percent my fault. If you want a elegant and cheap dress, you won't be wasting your money! Read more
items.author: Keyana

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's OK, with some caveats
items.body: I'm 5'3 and 185lbs and ordered an XL. The dress was long on me but I wore 2-3 inch heels and the length was almost perfect. I still found myself holding it up a bit as I was walking but thankfully it wasn't unbearable. If you're a shorter girly I'd recommend with caution. Be prepared to wear higher heels or get it hemmed. Taller girlies might find it to be too short depending on your fit preference. What i liked: 1. The color was just as expected. The sparkly brown was very subtle against my skin and felt very "soft glam" 2. The sleeves were very flattering and not too tight. The small bell at the end was also very feminine. The overall fit was also very nice, a bit stretchy so it moves nicely when walking, sitting/ standing, dancing, etc. 3. It's a decent price. More than what I would normally pay for clothing but I think for a gown is a respectable price (at time of purchase this item was priced at $64 ish) The obvious issues: 1. The sleeves roll up. I ended up using four safety pins around the front and back to help keep it in place but it wasn't a perfect system. I still had to adjust throughout the night but i would imagine if I didn't have the pins it would've been very annoying. 2. The stitching was a bit messy in places. Again thankfully not the worst but the stitching on the inside of the dress near the seams was a little bulky in some places which made it a little uncomfortable. Additionally, the top layer of fabric was a little itchy around my chest, it wasn't unbearable, but just something I noticed during the night. 3. I found glitter all over my carpet the next morning so obviously a lot came off the dress. It seemed to not be attached to the dress very well so that felt a little cheap when I saw how much was on the floor Overall it's OK. I'd recommend if you're looking for a pretty gown for not too much money, just be mindful of the length sleeves rolling up Read more
items.author: Cope

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb
items.body: Very nice dress. Looks more expensive than what anyone could think it is. It’s flattering and the color is very pretty. It works ok if you’re up to 5’5” with heels or taller with flats. Stretches nicely but it doesn’t adhere to your body like a Lycra, because it has the lining and a veil-mesh over it . However, it’s not for a black tie event bc it’s a typical fast fashion dress with hems that show the stitches, and totally synthetic cheap fabric. It’s however very good for young people, low key proms, even low key weddings and photo shoots. Read more
items.author: Blueybingo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Amazing dress!
items.body: AAAAMMMMMAAAZING dress super comfy and stretchy I usually buy a medium but I’m glad I purchased the small just in case it did run big. I went with the small since I was going for a slightly more fitted look. if I needed to wear the medium, I could’ve. I got so many compliments and the dress just made me feel beautiful. I’m 5’0 and 151lbs I didn’t need to get the dress hemmed once I put my heels on, I was good And even when I wore my flat shoes near the end of the wedding, I still didn’t struggle with the length. It’s just such a beautiful dress I bought it in brown which was absolutely stunning but I’m saving it for the fall lol. Both blue and brown are absolutely stunning colors. Hopefully, I can find it in a shorter version or a sleeveless version for summer events. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will probably work for your formal event
items.body: Ok so I bought this for a formal event this weekend. The fabric is pretty good the off the shoulder element is ok, it has trouble staying down. The sleeves have a nice length. Over the hand giving Morticia vibes. It’s also long enough. It’s not exactly burgundy to me, but the color is still ok. Amazon recommended me a medium I should’ve listened I got a large instead and while it does fit. I medium would’ve been more flattering. I’m 5’6 around 157lbs Read more
items.author: Tara a

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve Off Shoulder Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Black Floral, Pinkflower, Sequin Black, Blackred, Rose, Black, Darkgreen, Sequin Navy, Blackdot, Beige, Pinkfloral, Redfloral, Sequin Wine. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
